title: Idea about ohmwrecker
body:
Ohmwrecker is an item built to disable a turret promoting turret dives but to me and probably the reason why its not bought is simply because its not needed when you can just let a tank absorb damage to dive lol but i kinda feel like with all this new sieging strategies with herald baron zzrot and banner how about the item be converted to an anti siege item?

I thought about what if when the item is used on the turret the turret becommes upgraded for a X time and like in that game mode it can become immune to damage and upgrades its damage to focus only on clearing a wave of minions (machine gun turret or bring back the lazer)? :o

or like in teh game mode it fires that mega hlazer down the lane (doesnt affect champions)

replies.body: There used to be a summoner spell that did this, made the turret attack faster, and did aoe dmg while being immune to damage. Id be okay with bringing it back in the form of an item. I agree 100%!
